SEARCH
Package Transactions

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
Transactions.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
The Payment class represents a payment made by a customer in a retail system. It includes details about the amount due, the payment type, any discounts applied, the tax rate, and the change due.

      public void applyDiscount(double total, Discount rewardsDiscount, RewardsCustomer customer)

      Parameters:
      total - the total amount due for the payment
      rewardsDiscount - the discount to be applied
      customer - the customer making the payment
